function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evaluation matrix may not capture all relevant impact criteria, leading to incomplete assessment of BACS design and functionalities.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment may result in design flaws and increased risk of disease propagation in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research to identify all relevant impact criteria and incorporate them into the evaluation matrix. Review and update the matrix regularly to ensure it reflects current best practices in disease control and prevention.","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning algorithms can be used to identify patterns and trends in disease propagation and guide the inclusion of relevant impact criteria.","People":"Architects, engineers, and public health experts involved in building design and operation.","Owner":"Building design and operation teams, public health authorities."}]}
